column4: hello every one i'm new  to Ubuntu(Linux). Ubuntu freezes frequently , no response to anything, only option left for me is to force shutdown. please help me . please guide me if i'm in wrong channel.
You are in the correct channel. Is this a new installation of Ubuntu 12.04 (latest version from website)?
What behaviour are you experiencing, Ubuntu just crashes after some time?
I am going to bed shortly, one of these guys will be happy to help you.
